title.en: Webhook triggered with any event for each item in JSON array

hint.en:
Will try to parse the HTTP body as a JSON array, and trigger for each item item in the array.

Ex: ["a", "b", "c"] will result in three triggered events with the item tag set to a, b, c.

example.en: The HTTP request headers serialised as json string
The HTTP request query parameters serialised as json string
The HTTP request body as string
